title: Direct Instruction-Based Reading and Mathematics Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic reading and numeracy skills
context.additional_context: Essential foundational competency enhancement program for improving job performance of current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can summarize and interpret complex texts (500+ words) with 80% accuracy within two weeks.
Learners can solve basic math problems (fractions, ratios, data interpretation) with 90% accuracy by the third week.
Learners integrate reading and numeracy skills in authentic workplace scenarios through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
